titleStmt.title: Diotrephes detected, corrected, and rejected, and Archippus admonished: by a soft answer to an angry sermon and book lately published, intituled, A true account of what was done, at the casting of two members out of Mr. Stucleys congregation in Exon
titleStmt.author: E. T.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by M.S. for Henry Cripps and are to be sold at his shop in Popes Head Alley,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Mall, Thomas. A true account of what was done by a Church of Christ in Exon.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Popes Head Alley
